Location: Shepperton Rd & Somerset St, East Victoria Park
Description: Vehicles from two lanes at Shepperton Road lights have to merge quickly and then some want to turn right but have to veer slightly to left as there is a chicane, so they turn into the path of vehicles continuing along Oats Street
Roundabout is not working, requires modification or traffic lights.
Terrible traffic flow when train line is busy.

Main risk: Poor or no provision for cyclists
Description: Recent changes have made this road unsafe for cyclists

Location: Mint St & Shepperton Rd, East Victoria Park
Description: Very difficult to undertake a right hand turn at most times of the day/night. It requires traffic light for right hand turn

Location: Mint St & Shepperton Rd, East Victoria Park
Description: Needs an arrow traffic light to filter turning traffic from Shepperton Road onto Mint St. When traffic is waiting to turn right from both directions, oncoming traffic is obscured. It is a dangerous intersection.

Location: Basinghall St & Devenish St, East Victoria Park
Description: People ignoring stop signs, people not sure if they have to stop, squealing tyres and honking horns as near misses happen daily.

Location: Basinghall St & Berwick St, East Victoria Park
Description: Impossible to cross Berwick Street during the day as a driver due to heavy traffic. Speeding. Usually have to take a left, then a right down a secondary road to get across Berwick Street.

Location: Berwick St & Esperance St, East Victoria Park
Description: There is a brick boundary wall blocking visibility. The speed limit (and speeding vehicles) as well as the pitch of the road makes it difficult to safely pull out into traffic.

Location: Berwick St & Kent St, East Victoria Park
Description: Needs a green arrow to turn right. Otherwise the traffic is banked up and goes nowhere as there is no opportunity to turn right.

0092/1200  Albany Highway, Shepparton Road, Welshpool Road. This intersection has INCOMPLETE Walk Lights..  I watched as a woman with child in pram and one beside Waited for lights, realised she was Confused, and returned from whence she came..  Intersection is between Local Shops and Welshpool Railway Station..She would have been encouraging her children to Use Public Transport.. I did not need to drive till I turned 30!

Location: Etwell St & Westmorland St, East Victoria Park
Description: Poor visibility of on coming traffic as you are trying to enter Scarborough Beach Road

Main risk: Vehicles travel over the speed limit
Description: Around Devenish Street there are three schools with a lot of foot traffic, sadly cars speed horrendously to avoid the main road Berwick st. The speed humps
